title: Best Friends
description: Best Friends:They met each other by a stroke of luck and became inseparable friends from then on. Both were faced with terminal birth defects that would make anybody desolate for fear of death, yet it did not stop them from being the best they can be individually and for each other.Death did separate them physically but Joseph lives on, in his friend's thoughts, bringing smiles to his face as he has always done when was alive.
author: Ronald Destra
